scripts.push: node -e "const d=new Date(); const fecha=`${d.getDate().toString().padStart(2,'0')}${(d.getMonth()+1).toString().padStart(2,'0')}${d.getFullYear()} ${d.getHours().toString().padStart(2,'0')}:${d.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2,'0')}:${d.getSeconds().toString().padStart(2,'0')}`; console.log('Commit:', fecha); require('child_process').execSync(`git add . && git commit -m \"Auto commit - ${fecha}\" && git push`, {stdio: 'inherit'})"
